data.about:
Read this now 👇

You may have browsed through hundreds of LinkedIn profiles before coming here, but you are now seeing the best!

I've spent more than ten years polishing my talents in a variety of job functions, responsibilities, and organizations and have been able to acquire the necessary skill sets to get any creative job done. My ability to simplify complicated procedures into teachable curricula and to create a friendly learning environment for students and beneficiaries of the subjects I take was developed early in my career as a teacher. Today, I instruct 100s of students in poetry, digital marketing, cryptocurrency investing, and copywriting using my skills and experience.

I gained a practical and meticulous understanding of various accounting software, the accounting process, and deeper insights into inventory control and budgeting thanks to the opportunity to work as an accountant at a supermarket. Working with an auditor during the audit process exposed me to the delicate financial minutiae that are the lifeblood of every firm, whether it is a large corporation or a small SME.

My ability to sell and persuade others to buy is not a matter of luck; rather, it is a result of demand from the companies I own and have worked for. Upping my game at every opportunity I get has enhanced my ability to develop incomparable deals, and services that are rich in value, and better marketing techniques with each customer or patron I get the chance to connect with and present my products or services.

At this point, a lot of people ask me what I can do for them or what services I can provide for them.
To put it simply, I present to the public 3 latent abilities:

📍 My outstanding presentation and writing abilities: I have a lot of experience creating well-rounded, high-trending material. novels, articles, books, technical writing, recommendation letters, personal statements, long- and short-form marketing copy, and essays. You may find my many books by searching on Google for "Emmanuel Odekunle Amazon".

📍 I assist Small and Medium-sized Enterprises in developing plans to rule the social media landscape. I am able to accomplish this since I was raised in the digital age and have a thorough understanding of various digital and social media platforms.

📍 International admissions, scholarships, and remote employment: You may choose to continue your education overseas or find a remote position in high-ranking countries. I'm always only a DM away.

Here? That's fantastic!

P.S: nuelodekunle20@gmail.com
P.SS: WhatsApp + 2349151294786

experiences.description: Numerox Conglomerate is a holding company for five separate businesses with different products and service lines. The five sister companies directly associated with the holding company are The Virtual Adviser, Breakout Inc., Peak Prevarsity, Orange Consultium, and Certified Now. Numerox Conglomerate act as the corporate family, front and structure for the sister organizations connected to her in terms of recruitment, funding, training of employees and deployment of vital resources and legal framework for the companies to seek partnerships and cooperations from its stakeholders.

experiences.description:
RESTful APIs:

Understanding of HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) and status codes
Ability to design and implement RESTful architecture
Knowledge of API documentation and specification (e.g., Swagger)
Experience with data formats like JSON and XML
Authentication and authorization mechanisms (e.g., OAuth, JWT)
API versioning and backward compatibility
Handling error responses and exception handling
Performance optimization and caching strategies
Testing and debugging of APIs using tools like Postman
JavaScript:

Proficiency in core JavaScript concepts, syntax, and data structures
Understanding of DOM manipulation and event handling
Experience with JavaScript frameworks and libraries (e.g., React, Angular, Vue)
Asynchronous programming with Promises, async/await, or callbacks
Knowledge of browser compatibility and cross-platform development
Understanding of AJAX and Fetch API for making server requests
Working with JSON and manipulating data
Front-end development skills like HTML and CSS
Debugging and optimizing JavaScript code
Knowledge of JavaScript build tools (e.g., webpack, Babel)
PHP:

Strong understanding of PHP syntax and language features
Experience with PHP frameworks (e.g., Laravel, Symfony, CodeIgniter)
Database integration and SQL query execution
Knowledge of web development concepts (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
Handling form submissions and user input validation
Implementing user authentication and authorization
Working with APIs and integrating external services
Debugging and error handling in PHP
Security best practices and protection against common vulnerabilities
Performance optimization and caching techniques in PHP applications Back End Developer Apr 2023 - Oct 2023 · 7 mos

experiences.description:
The Virtual Adviser is a peer2peer network where people seek advice, get advice and give advice. Here at The Virtual Adviser, we seek to create an ecosystem of unique and differentiated professional advice available at the click of a button, to provide access to noteworthy information, and connect real-life experiences and expertise in a bid to solve big and small problems faced by both businesses and individuals. Today, The Virtual Adviser is a growing pool of strategic problem solvers on a global scale with individuals and businesses from anywhere in the world without restrictions being able to receive advice at a pocket-friendly sum, both creating an ecosystem of mutual benefit to both the advice seeker and the advice giver.

Check us out at: https://thevirtualadviser.wordpress.com/ Technical Support Specialist Jun 2017 - Jan 2023 · 5 yrs 8 mos

experiences.description:
My Upwork profile: https://www.upwork.com/freelancers/~01fb645d1cf5abe186
Read what I want to offer you below: 
My name is Emmanuel. I am an ideator and design thinker. I am sure you have read that on my LinkedIn Bio. I mention helping to cloth skeletal business ideas with flesh. Yes, that's right. That's what I love doing and that's what I am known for. 

Do you have a business idea and do not know the way forward? The best thing to do right now is to hire me help you give shape to aspects of your business idea that would make it salable to your future clients, investors and employees. 

My Services: From Generating catchy and memorable Business Name, to creating super taglines, to creating business plans, to helping you search for a good domain name that will give your business the competitive spot online, to running ads on various social media (Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram etc. To helping you think through business financials and creating super sales copies and slogans and wining with venture capitalists etc. 

I would admit that I am a generalist, well, that's who you want to handle your business modelling, someone who is versatile across so many business functions and have handled different project from Human Resources to Financials. 

Now you may be curious as to what I studied in school, and where and whom i have worked for?
I was trained in the university to become Development Economist and I have 7 years work experience in Design and Writing, Human Resources, Sales and Startups. I have written so many books on selling, some of which are available on Amazon, books in creative writing and lots more, you could view my portfolio of book by google searching the phrase "Emmanuel Odekunle Amazon" 

I believe in excellence and seeing the businesses i work with grow into supermassive giants. 
Should you love to work with me. 
Shoot me a message on Whatsapp via +2349151294786 
an Email: nuelodekunle20@gmail.com
